UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the Baseline application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, same as Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

position.description: User's basketball playing position (PG, SG, SF, PF, C).

experienceLevel.description: User's experience level in basketball (e.g., beginner, intermediate, advanced).

profilePhotoUrl.description: URL of the user's profile photo stored in Firebase Storage.

sessionsCompleted.description: Number of sessions the client has completed this month.

totalSessions.description: Total number of sessions allocated to the client for the month.

xp.description: Experience points earned by the user.

Connection.title: Connection
Connection.description: Represents a friendship link between two users.

initiator.description: The UID of the user who initiated the connection.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a private chat.

Workout.title: Workout
Workout.description: Represents a basketball workout with instructions and details. Can be assigned to users.

authorId.description: The UID of the admin or coach who created this workout.

difficulty.description: Difficulty level of the workout (e.g., beginner, intermediate, advanced).

duration.description: Duration of the workout in minutes.

category.description: Category of the workout (shooting, ball handling, defense, conditioning, vertical jump).

videoUrl.description: URL of the embedded video demonstrating the workout.

WorkoutProgress.title: WorkoutProgress
WorkoutProgress.description: Represents a user's progress for a specific workout.

id.description: Unique identifier for the workout progress entry.

date.description: Date when the workout was performed.

timeSpent.description: Time spent on the workout in minutes.

isCompleted.description: Indicates whether the workout was completed.

Meal.title: Meal
Meal.description: Represents a meal with ingredients, instructions, and nutritional information. Can be assigned to users.

authorId.description: The UID of the admin or coach who created this meal.

category.description: Category of the meal (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snacks, Pre-game meals, Post-game meals).

ingredients.description: List of ingredients for the meal.

steps.description: Step-by-step instructions for preparing the meal.

protein.description: Amount of protein in the meal (in grams).

carbs.description: Amount of carbohydrates in the meal (in grams).

fat.description: Amount of fat in the meal (in grams).

UserMealPlan.title: UserMealPlan
UserMealPlan.description: Represents a user's saved meal plan with editable daily schedules.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user meal plan.

date.description: Date for which the meal is scheduled.

mealTime.description: Time of day for the meal (e.g., Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner).

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Represents a user-submitted basketball court location.

name.description: The name of the court or location.

address.description: The physical address of the location.

photoUrls.description: URLs of user-submitted photos of the court.

creatorId.description: The UID of the user who submitted this location.

BallIsLifePost.title: BallIsLifePost
BallIsLifePost.description: Represents a 'Ball is Life' post with a selfie and location.

creatorId.description: The UID of the user who created the post.

creatorName.description: The display name of the creator.

creatorPhotoUrl.description: The profile photo URL of the creator.

selfieUrl.description: URL of the selfie photo stored in Firebase Storage.

location.description: The location where the user is playing.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a merchandise item in the Baseline store.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

imageId.description: The ID for the product's image in placeholder-images.json

priceXp.description: The price of the product in XP points.

priceCash.description: The cash price of the product.

UserOrder.title: UserOrder
UserOrder.description: Represents a user's order for a product.

userId.description: The UID of the user who placed the order.

productName.description: The name of the product at the time of order.

productImageId.description: The image ID of the product.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method used for the order.

amountPaid.description: The amount paid (in XP or cash).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the order was placed.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to prioritize authorization independence, clarity, and scalability for the Baseline application. User-owned data (workout progress, meal plans) is stored in subcollections under the `/users/{userId}` path to easily control data access with path-based security. A central, public library for workouts, meals, and locations is maintained in top-level `/workouts`, `/meals`, and `/locations` collections. This segregation simplifies security rules: user-specific data is protected by ownership checks, while public content is broadly readable but write-protected, awaiting a proper admin role for content management, or allowing authenticated users to contribute (as with locations). This design eliminates the need for `get()` calls in security rules, supporting atomic operations and improving debuggability.
